column2: b'Monkey Punch: Manga Katsudou Daishashin - Crime Mate Special'
b'Miki and Naomi deal with biological weapons and arms dealer Ramon. Some characters from Mankatsu as well as the 4 central characters from Lupin III can be seen in the background at times.'
